name: mssqlGetRestoreFilesV1
description: Provides a list of database files to be restored for the specified restore or export operation.

id.description: ID of the Microsoft SQL database.

time.description: Time, in ISO8601 date-time format, to recover to. For example, "2016-01-01T01:23:45.678". This value or the LSN are required.

lsn.description: LSN to recover to. This value or the time are required.

recovery_fork_guid.description: Recovery fork GUID of LSN to recover to. Meaningful only when lsn is specified.

$ul: **fileId**: Original file ID of the database file to be restored.
**fileType**: File type of a database file.
**logicalName**: Logical name of the database file to be restored.
**originalName**: Original filename of the database file to be restored.
**originalPath**: Original path to the database file to be restored.
